info.name: Categories API
info.description: API endpoints for categories with deal counts

request.description:
Get all categories with deal counts.

**Features:**
- Public endpoint (no authentication required)
- Returns all categories
- Includes deal count for each category
- Sorted by name_en (ascending)

**Response includes:**
- id
- name_en (English name)
- name_ar (Arabic name)
- slug
- deals_count (number of deals in category)
- products_count (alias for deals_count)
- created_at

request.description:
Get a specific category by ID with deal count.

**Features:**
- Public endpoint (no authentication required)
- Returns category details with deal count
- Returns 404 if category not found

**Usage:**
- Get details for a specific category
- Check how many deals are in a category
